name: Negative Space (itch) (LowSodium)
description:
Negative Space is a single-player puzzle-platformer game playing with the concept of space. Test yourself and experience 12 mind-bending puzzles levels!

Credits: 

Game Design, Principal Level Design, Programming, Sound - Xuan "Nelson" Nie

Art, User Interface, Level Design - Xinyi Guo

Music Credit - Gnossienne No. 1 Composed by Erik Satie
